name: rockfish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of various types of fish found among rocks, or the flesh of this type of fish: Large numbers of rockfish, including bocaccio and widow rockfish, can be seen swimming in the pools. We recommend eating rockfish at most once a week.
a silver fish with stripes on its side that can be eaten, found along the coasts and in the rivers of North America, or the flesh of this type of fish: The fish - morone saxatilis to the biologist, rock fish to a southerner - are found in these waters. Synonym
striped bass
More examplesFewer examplesThey hope to find about 12 rockfish during each haul of the net.The limestone provides a good habitat for crabs, rock fish and other animals that prey on oysters.Rockfish, cod, and other deepwater prizes are drawing fleets into the depths.Rockfish are common to the northern Pacific and are prized by sport and commercial fishermen.
